channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 13:10 Air alert in Poltava region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 13:10 Air alert in Poltava region. Follow further messages. #Poltava_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 13:05 Threat of artillery shelling in Pokrovska territorial community ends. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 13:05 Threat of artillery shelling in Pokrovska territorial community ends. Stay tuned for further reports. #Pokrovska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 12:22 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now taking place in the Pokrovsk Territorial Community. Take shelter!
item.description: 🔴 12:22 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now taking place in the Pokrovsk Territorial Community. Take shelter! #Покровська_териториальна_громада This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 10:00 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of the civilian population – 0800339291
